#summary The onbeforeprint event fires before you print a document or frame.
#labels about-dom,is-dom-event,from-microsoft

== Usage ==

== Event targets ==

The `onbeforeprint` event fires on these objects:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [WindowObject window]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
